search_results.title: Xavier Watts
search_results.snippet: Xavier Watts (born November 22, 2001) is an American professional football safety for the Atlanta Falcons of the National Football League (NFL).

search_results.title: Xavier Watts', Billy Bowman Jr.'s past at wide receiver a ...
search_results.snippet: Xavier Watts and Billy Bowman Jr. both embarked on their college careers as wide receivers but became defensive backs.
